title: Chinese Overlords Tencent
body: Because riot is owned by tencent, if you say anything racist about chinese their systems will automatically pick it up and you will be banned quicker.

replies.body:
If you say anything racist about anyone you will be banned quicker.

Hate speech (such as racism, sexism, homophobia, etc) is treated very seriously, and will often result in escalated punishments compared to more 'mundane' negative chat.
what if they dont say anything like that, but their clubname is inappropriate? does Riot system also punish people with inappropriate club name?

It does. Depending on the circumstances it may only be with a club disband or forced name change, but it can result in harsher punishments (though typically only for the club creator if I recall correctly).
